scenariodescription: The robot is tasked with transporting boxes from one end of the warehouse to the other. While navigating through the Passageways and approaching an Intersection, the robot encounters a group of three humans standing together and chatting. They are in the middle of the Intersection, partially blocking the path.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is part of the group and checks if the robot says 'EXCUSE ME'. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 gives way to the robot and moves out of its path until it is no longer close to the robot. If the robot does not say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 1 continues standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 2: Human 2 is part of the group and checks if the robot says 'EXCUSE ME'. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 gives way to the robot and moves out of its path until it is no longer close to the robot. If the robot does not say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 2 continues standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 3: Human 3 is part of the group and checks if the robot says 'EXCUSE ME'. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 gives way to the robot and moves out of its path until it is no longer close to the robot. If the robot does not say 'EXCUSE ME', Human 3 continues standing in the group.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should say 'EXCUSE ME' upon encountering the group of humans. It should wait for the humans to give way before proceeding through the Intersection.
